title: Windows Phone Tools Self-Install instead of Web-Install
body: It would be very nice to be able to download the entire Windows Phone Tools and install it, instead of having to use the web for installation. I am a teacher and having to install it this way for the entire lab takes forever.

comments.body: There is a link to the .iso file here: http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=27570
